item.description:
Join Bill for some Go-Carting this Saturday!  Bill will host this meetup and post additional info (contact) as it approaches.

This Event is being Cross-Posted from "The Connecticut 20's-40's Social Group".  The Below is copied from their Event Posting Here.  (The 20's-40's Group appears to have a fee, so let him know you're from the NHC posting.)  Please see the website listed below for fees before signing up!

 

>>>
Its go cart time!  On track in wallingford is pretty good. They are fast! 40mph and it gets chilly cuase its so fast so be sure to dress warm!  Please check out the site for all information. Looks like you have to get a membership which you can do for a month or a year.  If we get enough people or enough races bought at once (20) we can get a group discount.  So please please make sure you show up if you put yes. I am going to try to make a reservation for us cause if we dont its not guaranteed well get on if we have a lot of people. (group info is below) After we can head to humpreys right down the street or head to the area where all the bars are and grab some food and drink.

 

Here is the site to check out all the info.

 

http://www.ontrackkarting.com/

 

Any questions let me know. If anyone is organizer or anything of any other groups feel free to cross post with others.

 

 Here is the info from the site about groups.

 

Please note our group pricing has changed effective 1/1/2012.

Round up your friends, family, and/or coworkers to take advantage of our group rates. Buy 20 or more races (in a single transaction) and you’ll save 25% Monday through Friday and 20% on weekends and holidays. All additional races purchased and run by any member of your group during that same visit will also qualify for this discounted rate. All participants must have a valid membership. In addition to the discount on races, non-members in your group can obtain a 1/2-price trial membership to get them started.

Please note head socks are not included with the group rate, although one is included with each paid membership. Additional/replacement head socks are available at a cost of $2 each. Remember that once purchased, head socks are yours to keep and reuse.

Reservations are recommended and require a $50 deposit. Our group rate is available to walk-ins, but track availability isn’t guaranteed.
<<<
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Bill, whom will post his contact information soon...
item.name: Go Carts - On Track Wallingford
